nodes.text: Daneska Varbarós was a human female pilot in the Royal Naboo Security Forces, and the successor to Ric Olié. She served Senator Padmé Amidala, former queen of Naboo, during her time in the Galactic Senate.
Queen's Shadow author E. K. Johnston stated that actress Gina Torres, specifically her role in the television show Cleopatra 2525, served as inspiration for Varbarós' appearance.
